drive.google.com

IMG_2935.MOV

Google Drive file.

When we set the set point to around 90 degrees from the current position the optimized points jitter back and forth from front to back. Our drive code is basically exactly the talonfx swerve template without any modifications other than tunerconstants. Any idea what the issues could be?
